text: The Civil Registry and Identification Service () is an institution for public service in Chile. It registers people's civil statuses and other issues which, by law, it has to register. == References == * Departamento de Estudios Financieros del Ministerio de Hacienda. 1958. Manual de Organización del Gobierno de Chile. Santiago de Chile. Talleres Gráficos La Nación S.A. ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Government of Chile Category:Public services
title: Civil Registry and Identification Service of Chile
